message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your 60-40 split was a bit too lopsided. How about we meet closer to the middle with a 55-45 split in your favor?
I'll meet you closer to the middle, but I still think I deserve a bit more. How about 57-43?
This is getting us nowhere fast. I'll move closer to your offer, but we need to close this deal soon before inflation eats away at your gains.
I know inflation is eating away, but I'm willing to take the risk for a better deal. 58-42 is my new offer.
Alice, let's be real. Inflation is killing your end of this deal. I'm offering a straight 50/50 split. Take it or leave it, but it's the best you'll get at this point.
